name: agilesafe-ai-platform
description: AgileSAFe AI Platform - Full-stack application with AI/ML capabilities

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:ml"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ml-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
